org.jruyi.core

Interface IUdpServerConfiguration


  • public interface IUdpServerConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure a UDP server service.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply()
      Applies this configuration to the associated UDP server service.
      java.lang.String bindAddr()
      Returns the bound address or null if bound to ANY addresses.
      boolean broadcast()
      Returns whether to enable SO_BROADCAST.
      IUdpServerConfiguration broadcast(boolean broadcast)
      Sets true to enable SO_BROADCAST; set false to disable SO_BROADCAST.
      int port()
      Returns the port.
      int sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds()
      Returns the timeout in seconds for idle channels.
      IUdpServerConfiguration sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds(int sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds)
      Sets the timeout in seconds for idle channels.
      java.lang.Integer trafficClass()
      Returns the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header, or null if not configured.
      IUdpServerConfiguration trafficClass(java.lang.Integer trafficClass)
      Sets the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header.

    • Method Detail

      • bindAddr

        java.lang.String bindAddr()
        Returns the bound address or null if bound to ANY addresses.
        Returns:
        the bound address

      • port

        int port()
        Returns the port.
        Returns:
        the port

      • sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds

        int sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds()
        Returns the timeout in seconds for idle channels.
        Returns:
        the idle timeout in seconds

      • sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds

        IUdpServerConfiguration sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds(int sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds)
        Sets the timeout in seconds for idle channels. Sets 0 to not allow idle channels. Sets -1 to never time out.
        Parameters:
        sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds - the idle timeout in seconds to set
        Returns:
        this configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified idleTimeoutInSeconds is less than -1

      • trafficClass

        java.lang.Integer trafficClass()
        Returns the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header, or null if not configured.
        Returns:
        the traffic class or type-of-service octet

      • trafficClass

        IUdpServerConfiguration trafficClass(java.lang.Integer trafficClass)
        Sets the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header. Sets null to not configure.
        Parameters:
        trafficClass - the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header
        Returns:
        this configuration

      • broadcast

        boolean broadcast()
        Returns whether to enable SO_BROADCAST.
        Returns:
        true if to enable SO_BROADCAST, otherwise false

      • broadcast

        IUdpServerConfiguration broadcast(boolean broadcast)
        Sets true to enable SO_BROADCAST; set false to disable SO_BROADCAST.
        Parameters:
        broadcast - indicates whether to enable SO_BROADCAST
        Returns:
        this configuration

      • apply

        void apply()
    throws java.lang.Throwable
        Applies this configuration to the associated UDP server service.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - if any error happens
